description: Will Braun is having marital issues with his wife, so he decides to buy her flowers. There, he meets Chris Harder, a florist who offers him an ear to listen should the flowers not be enough. Later that day, Chris finds Will standing at his door with the bouquet of destroyed flowers, looking to talk. Chris, however, wants more than just to talk. After some convincing, Chris buries his face into Will's crotch. It's not long before Chris is bouncing on Will's hard cock like the filthy home wrecker he is.
title: Home Wrecker Part 2
